trans-unit.source: In **Solution Explorer**, right-click the project (not the solution) and select **Add > Azure API App Client**.
trans-unit.target: In **Solution Explorer**, right-click the project (not the solution) and select **Add > Azure API App Client**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Add Azure API App Client** dialog, click **Download from Azure API App**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Add Azure API App Client** dialog, click **Download from Azure API App**.

trans-unit.source: From the drop-down list, select the API app that you want to call.
trans-unit.target: From the drop-down list, select the API app that you want to call.

trans-unit.source: The wizard downloads the API metadata file and generates a typed interface for calling the API app.
trans-unit.target: The wizard downloads the API metadata file and generates a typed interface for calling the API app.

trans-unit.source: Once code generation is complete, you see a new folder in **Solution Explorer**, with the name of the API app.
trans-unit.target: Once code generation is complete, you see a new folder in **Solution Explorer**, with the name of the API app.

trans-unit.source: This folder contains the code that implements the client classes and data models.
trans-unit.target: This folder contains the code that implements the client classes and data models.
